amendment.description: Amendment to first decrease then increase Army Corp of Engineers funding for Construction by $10 million in order to direct those funds to support the Great Lakes Fishery and Economic Restoration (GLFER).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to first decrease then increase Army Corp of Engineers funding for Construction by $10 million for the support of GLFER.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Duffy amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Duffy amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Duffy.
